name: Wonder Workshop - Dash Robot Introduction (K-2)
description: Beginner robotics curriculum for Dash robot. Learn basic programming through visual block coding, movement, sounds, and lights. No reading required interface perfect for early elementary.

name: Wonder Workshop - Dash Intermediate Programming (3-5)
description: Intermediate Dash curriculum teaching loops, events, variables, and conditionals. Build complex programs controlling robot behavior. CSTA standards-aligned computer science curriculum.
stem_fields: Robotics, Computer Science, Programming, Computational Thinking

name: Wonder Workshop - Cue Robot Advanced Programming (6-8)
description: Advanced robotics with Cue robot teaching JavaScript programming. Text-based coding, advanced sensors, and AI concepts. Prepare middle schoolers for high school computer science.
stem_fields: Robotics, JavaScript, Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence

name: Wonder Workshop - Math with Dash (K-5)
description: Integrate mathematics concepts with robotics. Teach geometry, measurement, patterns, and problem-solving through Dash robot activities. STEM cross-curricular learning.

name: Wonder Workshop - Science Adventures with Dash (K-5)
description: Explore science concepts through robotics challenges. Physical science, engineering design, and scientific inquiry. Hands-on NGSS-aligned science curriculum.

name: Wonder Workshop - Storytelling with Dash (K-5)
description: Combine literacy and robotics through storytelling projects. Create interactive stories, character development, and narrative structure with robot animation. Arts integration.

name: Wonder Workshop - Blockly App
description: Visual block-based programming app for Dash and Dot robots. Drag-and-drop coding interface teaching programming fundamentals. Free app for tablets and computers.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Programming, Blockly, Visual Coding

name: Wonder Workshop - Wonder App
description: Beginner-friendly app with guided challenges and tutorials. Learn robotics through play-based activities. Perfect for home learning and independent exploration.

name: Wonder Workshop - Go App
description: Drive Dash and Dot robots like remote control vehicles. Introduction to robot control and spatial reasoning. Entry point for youngest learners.

name: Wonder Workshop - Path App
description: Programming through drawing paths for robots to follow. Visual programming introducing sequencing concepts. Bridge between direct control and block coding.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Programming, Sequencing, Visual Learning

name: Wonder Workshop - Xylo App
description: Program Dash robot to play xylophone accessory. Learn music, sequencing, and patterns through musical composition. STEAM integration with music.

name: Wonder Workshop - Classroom Management Portal
description: Free teacher dashboard managing student progress, robot inventory, and lesson planning. Track class activities, share resources, and monitor learning objectives. Professional development tools.
stem_fields: Educational Technology, Teaching Tools, Classroom Management

name: Wonder Workshop - Professional Development
description: Free online training for educators using Wonder robots. Webinars, video tutorials, and best practices for classroom implementation. Earn PD certificates.
stem_fields: Teacher Training, Robotics Education, Professional Development

name: Wonder Workshop - Wonder League Robotics Competition
description: Global robotics competition for K-8 students. Monthly challenges, showcase projects, and compete with students worldwide. Free participation building competition and presentation skills.

name: Wonder Workshop - Project Library
description: Free library of project ideas, challenges, and lesson extensions. Browse by grade level, subject, or skill. Teacher-created and community-shared resources.

name: Wonder Workshop - Home Learning Resources
description: Curriculum and activities adapted for home use. Parent guides, project ideas, and structured learning paths for families. Support homeschool and after-school learning.

name: Wonder Workshop - Accessibility Features
description: Built-in accessibility features for diverse learners. Visual programming for non-readers, switch control support, and multi-sensory feedback. Inclusive robotics education.

name: Wonder Workshop - Multi-Language Support
description: Apps and curriculum available in multiple languages. Support English language learners and international classrooms. Global robotics education platform.
